biz.gabrys.lesscss.compiler2.LessVariableOption

    Package Description
    biz.gabrys.lesscss.compiler2
    The LessCSS Compiler compiles Less source files to CSS code.

    • Uses of LessVariableOption in biz.gabrys.lesscss.compiler2

      Returns global variables that can be referenced by the files (default: [].

      Returns modify variables that can overwrite variables defined in the files (default: [].
